title: У самовара
author: Cherkasova Iren
description:
This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Nearby Samovar' is related to realism being a representative of houshold portraits genre. Perhaps, it seems like the painting lacks some colors, however no detail here is redundant. Just take a look once again. What a subtle, delicate and skillfull handwork it is! It is even possible to see a full still-life composition with a flower in the vase.

This artwork has a Guiness certificate for being exhibited in more than 10000 meters height. It took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
